description: Keita is a third-year junior-high school student studying for his high school entrance exams. He wants to enter the same high school as his older twin step-sisters Ako and Riko, and to do so must study hard while getting help from his sisters as well. While at first he initially dislikes himself for becoming attracted to Ako and Riko, he later becomes proactive in his desires. He is weak when it comes to alcohol, and will become livelier when he drinks.
name: Suminoe Keita
